TopicTitle: Ask the Mods questions about the Forums!

Articles.Content:
> 
> 
> 8 hours ago, akandr said:
> 
> 
> Sorry if it's inappropriate topic to ask, but for some reason i can't see the new DLC subforum if i'm not logged in. And if a follow a link a got Error code: **2F176/1.** Is this intentional or a bug? I'm using windows 10 and Google Chrome.
> 

Yep, you're not the first person to report that.

<iframe allowfullscreen="" data-controller="core.front.core.autosizeiframe" data-embedcontent="" data-embedid="embed645934278" scrolling="no" src="https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/topic/172336-making-history-forums-can-not-be-seen-when-logged-out/&do=embed" style="height:212px;max-width:502px;"></iframe>

We'll look into it, thanks.

[EDIT]  ...All fixed now!  Thanks for bringing it to our attention.

The [post](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/92229#Logs)that explained how to get logs and that I was linking in each of my mode post is gone. What is going on ? That post had all the info we needed mod user to include...

[@sarbian](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/57146-sarbian/) Hmm, yeah the link looks broken. That's odd. Was it this post?

People are reporting some other link breakages. We've just learned of it and have no info yet. Sorry. ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif ":(")

Question for any interested mod:  

 I'm considering making a humorous tutorial on the math of reaction engines based on using wolverines and honey badgers as propellant and "ferocity" as the accelerant. Would this raise any objections or violate any terms of service? Should I wave off?

Best,  

-Slashy

> 
> 
> 4 hours ago, GoSlash27 said:
> 
> 
> Question for any interested mod:  
> 
>  I'm considering making a humorous tutorial on the math of reaction engines based on using wolverines and honey badgers as propellant and "ferocity" as the accelerant. Would this raise any objections or violate any terms of service? Should I wave off?
> 
> 
> 
> 
> Best,  
> 
> -Slashy
> 

Follow the usual principles of our content rules and you should be okay. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif ":)") As I recall, the original honey badger joke video had a lot of profanity in it. Obviously, we would not want you to reproduce that style here.

Do you guys have the ability to edit our signatures?  I believe I've buggered mine.

CubeUpload was out for like two days, so I changed the Title of my Dres Awareness badge from the gibberish filename to a message about my screenshots being dead. (So it would be displayed when the badge wasn't loaded.

CubeUpload is back up, and now the message and badge is gone, and there's literally nothing there for it when I go to edit.  But, sometimes I do see something flash when my signature is loaded in a post.

I'd like it purged so I can start over if possible.

> 
> 
> On 18/03/2018 at 1:13 PM, Vanamonde said:
> 
> 
> People are reporting some other link breakages. We've just learned of it and have no info yet. Sorry. ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif ":(")
> 

Any updates (or any other thread I should be following on this issue)?  I'm getting lots of grief from people complaining about broken links using the old-style links and I really don't want to have to go track down and fix everything if I don't have to.
